attributes.action: Raise the maximum price for MOT tests for the first time since 2010
attributes.additional_details: We believe implementing a new maximum limit will help independent garages to stay open, keeping people in jobs.
attributes.background: The maximum price for an MOT test has not increased since 2010, despite a rise in many other business related costs since then. We believe this has caused many small businesses to go under, sometimes more often than is necessary.
